description: Allows the entity to be a thrown entity.
title: Projectile 1.8.0

angleoffset.description: Determines the angle at which the projectile is thrown
angleoffset.title: TODO title

catchFire.description: If true, the entity hit will be set on fire
catchFire.title: TODO title

critParticleOnHurt.description: If true, the projectile will produce additional particles when a critical hit happens
critParticleOnHurt.title: TODO title

destroyOnHurt.description: If true, this entity will be destroyed when hit
destroyOnHurt.title: TODO title

filter.description: Entity Definitions defined here can't be hurt by the projectile
filter.title: TODO title

fireAffectedByGriefing.description: If true, whether the projectile causes fire is affected by the mob griefing game rule
fireAffectedByGriefing.title: TODO title

gravity.description: The gravity applied to this entity when thrown. The higher the value, the faster the entity falls
gravity.title: TODO title

hitSound.description: The sound that plays when the projectile hits something
hitSound.title: TODO title

homing.description: If true, the projectile homes in to the nearest entity
homing.title: TODO title

inertia.description: The fraction of the projectile's speed maintained every frame while traveling in air
inertia.title: TODO title

isdangerous.description: If true, the projectile will be treated as dangerous to the players
isdangerous.title: TODO title

knockback.description: If true, the projectile will knock back the entity it hits
knockback.title: TODO title

lightning.description: If true, the entity hit will be struck by lightning
lightning.title: TODO title

liquid_inertia.description: The fraction of the projectile's speed maintained every frame while traveling in water
liquid_inertia.title: TODO title

multipletargets.description: If true, the projectile can hit multiple entities per flight
multipletargets.title: TODO title

offset.description: The offset from the entity's anchor where the projectile will spawn
offset.title: TODO title

onFireTime.description: Time in seconds that the entity hit will be on fire for
onFireTime.title: TODO title

potionEffect.description: Defines the effect the arrow will apply to the entity it hits
potionEffect.title: TODO title

power.description: Determines the velocity of the projectile
power.title: TODO title

reflectOnHurt.description: If true, this entity will be reflected back when hit
reflectOnHurt.title: TODO title

semirandomdiffdamage.description: If true, damage will be randomized based on damage and speed
semirandomdiffdamage.title: TODO title

shootSound.description: The sound that plays when the projectile is shot
shootSound.title: TODO title

shoottarget.description: If true, the projectile will be shot towards the target of the entity firing it
shoottarget.title: TODO title

shouldbounce.description: If true, the projectile will bounce upon hit
shouldbounce.title: TODO title

splashPotion.description: If true, the projectile will be treated like a splash potion
splashPotion.title: TODO title

splashRange.description: Radius in blocks of the 'splash' effect
splashRange.title: TODO title

uncertaintyBase.description: The base accuracy. Accuracy is determined by the formula uncertaintyBase - difficultyLevel * uncertaintyMultiplier
uncertaintyBase.title: TODO title

uncertaintyMultiplier.description: Determines how much difficulty affects accuracy. Accuracy is determined by the formula uncertaintyBase - difficultyLevel * uncertaintyMultiplier
uncertaintyMultiplier.title: TODO title
